coffeeShops.name: Okkio Caffe
coffeeShops.description: This cozy spot is known for its high-quality coffee, especially their egg coffee and coconut coffee, which are unique to Vietnam. The ambiance of this cafe, with its colorful tiled floor and diner-like vibe, makes it a popular choice for locals and tourists alike.

coffeeShops.name: Cong Caphe
coffeeShops.description: A nostalgic cafe inspired by Vietnam’s communist era, this popular chain offers a wide range of traditional Vietnamese coffees, including the famous egg coffee. The retro decor and army-themed memorabilia create a unique and memorable experience.

coffeeShops.name: La Viet Coffee
coffeeShops.description: Located in Vietnam’s coffee-growing region, La Viet serves freshly roasted Arabica beans. The large warehouse-style space offers tours of their coffee processing and is perfect for spending a few hours enjoying a cup of coffee.

coffeeShops.name: Rainforest
coffeeShops.description: This cafe has a treehouse-like design with hanging plants and cozy booths, providing a serene environment to enjoy coffee. It’s a great escape for those who love nature-inspired spaces.

coffeeShops.name: The Workshop Coffee
coffeeShops.description: Known for its artisanal approach to coffee, The Workshop is a must-visit for coffee lovers who enjoy a mix of pour-over, siphon brewing, and great ambiance. The airy, vintage industrial space is popular among digital nomads and entrepreneurs.
